# ElevenLabs API Free Tier Research

## Free Tier Limits (2024-2025)

### Character Limits

**Current Free Tier (2024):**
- **10,000 characters per month** (widely reported across sources)
- **20,000 credits per month** (updated for 2025)
  - 1 credit = 1 character for most models
  - Each generation capped at 2,500 characters max

### Features Available on Free Tier

**Voice Access:**
- Access to all premade voices
- Create up to 3 custom voices
- Shared voices with TTS in all supported languages

**Models:**
- Eleven English V1
- Eleven Flash V2
- Eleven Turbo V2
- Eleven Turbo V2.5 (current default)

**Output Formats:**
- MP3: `mp3_44100_128`, `mp3_22050_32`
- PCM/WAV: Limited to Creator tier and above

**Advanced Features:**
- Basic SSML support (break tags, phoneme tags)
- Voice settings control (stability, similarity_boost, speed)
- Emotional tags (v3 models)

### Limitations

**Commercial Usage:**
- ❌ No commercial license on free tier
- ✅ Intended for personal projects and experimentation only

**Output Formats:**
- ❌ PCM formats (pcm_16000, pcm_24000, pcm_44100) require Creator tier or higher
- ✅ MP3 formats available on free tier

**Generation Limits:**
- Max 2,500 characters per single generation (2025 update)
- Monthly character quota: 10,000-20,000 depending on source date

**API Access:**
- ✅ Full API access with ELEVENLABS_API_KEY
- ❌ Rate limits may apply (not publicly documented)

### Upgrade Tiers

**Creator Tier:**
- PCM audio format access
- Higher character limits
- Commercial license

**Pro Tier:**
- PCM 44.1kHz format access
- Highest character limits
- Advanced features (Director's Mode alpha)
- Priority support

## Sources

1. ElevenLabs Official Documentation (elevenlabs.io)
2. Community Forums (Reddit, Medium)
3. Third-party documentation (word-spinner.com)
4. YouTube tutorials (2024)

## Updated: 2025-11-14

**Note:** Free tier limits may change. Always verify current limits at https://elevenlabs.io/pricing
